content: Soumyajit Dey SOUMYAJIT DEY Associate Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur Email:    soumya@cse.iitkgp.ac.in Head (2023-2025) Centre for Computational Data Sciences Kharagpur, West Bengal - 721302, India When spring came, even the false spring, there were no problems except where to be happiest. The only thing that could spoil a day was people and if you could keep from making engagements, each day had no limits. People were always the limiters of happiness except for the very few that were as good as spring itself. -- Ernest Hemingway. I am looking for PostDocs and PhD/Mtech/Btech students interested to work with me in 1) Real Time / Cyber Physical Systems 2) Automated Reasoning and Programming Languages, 3) GPGPU optimizations. If you are interested, please contact me.
